page.title: 13HOMES IN 1985
page.content:
{HOMES IN 1985
Today most homes have a carpet on the floor and sometimes have tiles or lino in the kithen.{THE KITCHEN}is where people make their meals.They have refrigerators to keep food fresh, blenders for mixing food and drink, washing machines that wash clothes and spin dry them.Cookers,are powered by gas or electricity.{ {THE DINING ROOM}is for eating meals.It has chairs and a table.It often has a side board for storing dining utensils.{THE LOUNGE}is where people go and sit down after a meal or in the evening some times to watch T.V. or read, or listen to music.{THE BEDROOM has different types of beds.There are bunk beds,single beds,bed settees. Sometimes people have a dressing table and wardrobe for clothes and jewellery
